alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Bay, southeastern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 425 PM EDT/325 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lynn Haven, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Springfield, Live Oak, Ebro, Southport, Seminole Hills, College Station, Camp Flowers, Holmes Valley, Gainer Spring, Millers Ferry, Bennett, Brannonville, Knox Hill, Bunker, Vicksburg, Bayhead, West Bay and Red Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
